description:
Located in the heart of the West Village on Gay Street, this 1 bedroom 1 bath prewar apartment is just steps from Washington Square Park on one of the most charming blocks in the city.

This iconic light filled apartment includes kitchen with a dishwasher and stove as well as cable TV and wireless internet, electric and gas.

It is minutes from the best West Village shops, restaurants, and other attractions.
-
Convenient transportation by the  A,C,E, B,D,F,M,1,2,3 subway
name: In the heart of the West Village
review: The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
